description: MOM POS is a point-of-sale system designed specifically for restaurants to help improve operational efficiency and make it easy for restaurant owners to get started quickly.
mompos-like-mom: MOM POS is as meticulous and thoughtful as a mom, helping you save time and precisely manage your restaurant sales. Includes online ordering, customer tracking, and order management.

question: Q
shopperQuestion: Can I become a shopper to build my own menu?
shopperAnswerPart1: Yes, but not yet. It's still in the beta phase.
shopperAnswerPart4: to explore the menu editor, but you can't save changes to the backend yet.
passwordRevealAnswerPart1: No. I use PasswordHasher in .NET Core, so your password is securely hashed and never actually stored in the database.
passwordRevealAnswerPart2: Don't worry. You can also just use a fake password to register.
selfBuildQuestion: Did you build this on your own?
selfBuildAnswerPart1: Yes, I built both the frontend and backend by myself.

accountSpecialCharError: Account must not include special characters other than '.' and '_'.
accountConsecutiveError: Account must not include consecutive special characters.
accountStartEndError: Account must start and end with a letter or number.
accountReservedWordError: Account must not include reserved words like 'admin' or 'root'.
passwordComplexityError: Password must include both letters and numbers.
